Recent updates in NYC include a public school student ordered deported by a NJ judge, a surge in Amtrak police arrests at a Penn Station bathroom, and a tragic incident where a man died after being set on fire in Brooklyn. Additionally, NYC is experiencing scattered showers and potential thunderstorms.

### Emergencies & Risks

Multiple incidents in NYC raise concerns about public safety and emergency response effectiveness.

- NYC public school student Dylan faces deportation after being detained by ICE, ordered by a NJ immigration judge.
